c74object.name: cage.glue
c74object.description: cage.glue accepts a matrix-shaped llll of rolls, and combines them into a single roll according to their position in the matrix. By default, no empty voices or temporal gaps are inserted, but explicit voice and time intervals can be provided.
c74object.discussion: cage.glue is conceived to work in conjunction with cage.scissors.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: cage.glue is conceived to work in conjunction with cage.scissors.

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: glue, join, roll, voice, compose, matrix.
